Questions.Question: What is the name of the iconic cartoon character created by Walt Disney?
Questions.Explanation: Mickey Mouse is the beloved cartoon character created by Walt Disney in 1928.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series features a yellow family living in Springfield?
Questions.Explanation: The Simpsons is a long-running cartoon series that follows the lives of the Simpson family in the fictional town of Springfield.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in the cartoon 'Tom and Jerry'?
Questions.Explanation: Tom is the main character, a mischievous cat, in the classic cartoon 'Tom and Jerry'.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon features a group of crime-fighting turtles named after famous artists?
Questions.Explanation: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are a group of crime-fighting turtles named after famous artists, known for their martial arts skills.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the cartoon character who lives in a pineapple under the sea?
Questions.Explanation: SpongeBob SquarePants is the main character who lives in a pineapple under the sea in the cartoon of the same name.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series follows the adventures of a young boy and his talking dog?
Questions.Explanation: Adventure Time follows the adventures of Finn, a young boy, and his talking dog Jake in the Land of Ooo.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the cartoon character who constantly tries to catch a fast blue hedgehog?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Robotnik, also known as Eggman, is the main antagonist who constantly tries to catch Sonic the Hedgehog.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon series features a group of kids with superpowers who defend their town?
Questions.Explanation: The Powerpuff Girls features three girls with superpowers, Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup, who defend their town from villains.
